{% set dateConvert = doc.posting_date|string %} {% set date_parts = dateConvert.split('-') %} {% set year = date_parts[0] | int%} {% set month = date_parts[1] %} {% set day = date_parts[2] | int %} {% set month_en = { '01': 'January', '02': 'February', '03': 'March', '04': 'April', '05': 'May', '06': 'June', '07': 'July', '08': 'August', '09': 'September', '10': 'October', '11': 'November', '12': 'December' }[month] %}
{% set custom_first_name_en, custom_last_name_en, bank_name, bank_ac_no, department, designation, prefix = frappe.db.get_value('Employee', doc.employee, ['custom_first_name_en', 'custom_last_name_en', 'custom_bank', 'bank_ac_no', 'department', 'designation', 'custom_prefix_en']) %} {% set emp_name_en = custom_first_name_en + ' ' + custom_last_name_en %} {% if designation %} {% set designation_en = frappe.db.get_value('Designation', designation, 'custom_designation_en') %} {% else %} {% set designation_en = '' %} {% endif %} {% if bank_name %} {% set bank_name_en = frappe.db.get_value('Bank', bank_name, ['custom_bank_name_en']) %} {% else %} {% set bank_name_en = '' %} {% endif %}
{% set earningsData = frappe.get_all('Salary Detail', filters={'parent': doc.name, 'parentfield': 'earnings'}, fields=['name','salary_component', 'amount', 'parentfield'], order_by='idx asc' ) %} {% set deductionsData = frappe.get_all('Salary Detail', filters={'parent': doc.name, 'parentfield': 'deductions'}, fields=['name','salary_component', 'amount', 'parentfield'], order_by='idx asc' ) %}

Total income for the year: {{year}}
